title: Changes in relations between the U.S. and Indians

content.question: How and why did relations between the United States and American Indian nations change between 1830 and 1900 ?

frqParts.text: How and why did relations between the United States and American Indian nations change between 1830 and 1900 ?

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
